table.title: Most Commonly Installed Software
table.searchString: index=sccm sourcetype=sccm-installedsoftware |dedup Publisher00 _time| stats count by Publisher00 ProductName00 | sort -count

table.title: Computers not Booted in 30 Days
table.searchString: index=sccm sourcetype="sccm-operatingsystem" |dedup ComputerName LastBootUpTime00 InstallDate00| eval tnow=now() | eval TimeUnused=(tnow-LastBootUpTime00)/86400 | convert ctime(InstallDate00) ctime(LastBootUpTime00) | table ComputerName TimeUnused InstallDate00 LastBootUpTime00 | search TimeUnused > 500 | sort -TimeUnused

table.title: Commonly Installed Software Over Last 24 Hours

search.query: index=sccm sourcetype=sccm-installedsoftware |dedup Publisher00 _time| stats count, sparkline(count) as history by Publisher00 ProductName00 | sort -count

chart.title: Computers by Timezone
chart.searchString: index=sccm sourcetype="sccm-computersystem" | eval CurrentTimeZone=(CurrentTimeZone00/60) | stats count by CurrentTimeZone
